message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value, I propose a price of $110 for it. I hope this aligns well with your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $110 is a bit out of my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. For the product, I would like to propose a price of $108. This still allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction.
